org.gatein.api.portal.navigation
Interface Navigation

public interface Navigation

Navigation for a site responsible for the retrieval, saving, and removal of navigation nodes.

Author:
Nick Scavelli

getSiteId

SiteId getSiteId()
The SiteId of the navigation

Returns:
the site id

getPriority

Integer getPriority()
The priority of the navigation. This can be used to determine the order in which navigations of the same SiteType appear in a navigation menu.

Returns:
the priority or null if one is not specified.

setPriority

void setPriority(Integer integer)
Saves the priority for this navigation.

Parameters:
integer - the priority to save, can be null.

Node getNode(NodePath nodePath)
Returns a node represented by the node path or null if the node was not found.

Parameters:
nodePath - the path to the node
Returns:
the node or null if the node was not found

getNode

Node getNode(NodePath nodePath,
             NodeVisitor visitor)
Returns a node represented by the node path or null if the node was not found. The NodeVisitor is then used to determine further loading of nodes.

For example if you want to retrieve the node /foo/bar but also want to load it's children you can pass in Nodes.visitChildren() as the visitor to load the children of /foo/bar.

Parameters:
nodePath - the path to the node
visitor - the visitor used to determine further loading of nodes. The visitor is relative to the node represented by the node path.
Returns:
the node or null if the node was not found

loadNodes

Node loadNodes(NodeVisitor visitor)
Returns the root node of the navigation with nodes loaded dependent on the NodeVisitor

Parameters:
visitor - the visitor to determine how many nodes to load.
Returns:
the root node of the navigation

loadChildren

void loadChildren(Node parent)
Will load the children for a given node.

Parameters:
parent - the node which will have it's children loaded.

refreshNode

void refreshNode(Node node)
Will refresh the node with latest from storage. For example if nodes were added/removed, etc you can refresh/sync those changes. When conflicting changes exist, a merge will be attempted, however it could fail and lead to a non resolvable situation.

Parameters:
node - the node to refresh

refreshNode

void refreshNode(Node node,
                 NodeVisitor visitor)
Will refresh the node with latest from storage. When conflicting changes exist, a merge will be attempted, however it could fail and lead to a non resolvable situation. The visitor can be used to control new nodes to load.

Parameters:
node - the node to refresh
visitor - the visitor which can load more nodes.

removeNode

boolean removeNode(NodePath nodePath)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException,
                          NodeNotFoundException
Removes a node, represented by the node path

Parameters:
nodePath - the path to the node
Returns:
true if the node was removed, false otherwise
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if nodePath is null
NodeNotFoundException - if the node could not be found.

saveNode

void saveNode(Node node)
              throws IllegalArgumentException,
                     ApiException
Saves a node. All changes from this node and below (all children, grandchildren) are also saved.

Parameters:
node - the node to save
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if node is null
ApiException - if an exception occurred trying save the node
